At some point in your family’s history, a dragon interbred with your bloodline. Now, the sublime monster’s ancient power fuels your bloodrage.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.pmAO1Sni8xx71pLF]{Blind-Fight}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Zeq6RWYv5otvg8q7]{Cleave}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.FUW5mIXHNBBIQ1Sq]{Power Attack}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Fly),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Toughness}

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.sz7j540uypmqqvti]{Shield} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tkjnm3lw7ni82tag]{Resist Energy} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{Fly} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.be88e90guqbi1q1z]{Fear} (16th)

At 1st level, you must select one of the chromatic or metallic dragon types. Once chosen, this cannot be changed. A number of your bloodline powers deal damage and grant resistances based on your dragon type, as noted below.

Dragon Type Energy Type Breath Shape
Black Acid 60-foot line
Blue Electricity 60-foot line
Green Acid 30-foot cone
Red Fire 30-foot cone
White Cold 30-foot cone
Brass Fire 60-foot line
Bronze Electricity 60-foot line
Copper Acid 60-foot line
Gold Fire 30-foot cone
Silver Cold 30-foot cone
